translation: O Krishna, by the prevalence of impiety, the women of the family become corrupt; and, when women are corrupted, O Varshenya (descendant of Vrishni), intermingling of castes arises.
commentary: 1.41 from the prevalence of impiety? Krishna O Krishna? Pradushyanti become corrupt? Kulastriyah the women of the family? in women in women? Among the wicked (being) corrupt? Varshneya O Varshneya? Many arises? castemixture.No Commentary.
